多不饱和脂肪酸与骨关节炎之间是否存在因果关系？多不饱和脂肪酸（PUFA）对膝关节和髋关节骨关节炎（OA）的因果影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231117/Is-there-a-causal-link- Between-polyunaturated-fatty-acids-and-osteoarthritis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231117/Is-there-a-causal-link- Between-polyunaturated-fatty-acids-and-osteoarthritis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e55f5606-fefc-46a8-b26b-4ccbfc909fab Fri, 17 Nov 2023 08:10:00 -0500 Is there a causal link between polyunsaturated fatty acids and osteoarthritis?
食用 UPF 会增加患癌症和心脏代谢多种疾病的风险UPF 消耗与癌症、心血管疾病和 2 型糖尿病之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231117/Conspiration-of-UPFs-increases-the-risk-of-cancer-and-cardiometabolic-multimorbidity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231117/Conspiration-of-UPFs-increases-the-risk-of-cancer-and-cardiometabolic-multimorbidity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=467edbe7-3af4-4bfc-b435-8c4e1dd01b85 Fri, 17 Nov 2023 07:20:00 -0500 Consumption of UPFs increases the risk of cancer and cardiometabolic multimorbidity

大多数州禁止在拘留期间给孕妇戴镣铐，但许多州报告说受到限制2022 年，阿什莉·丹尼 (Ashley Denney) 怀孕约七个月，当时警察在佐治亚州卡罗尔县逮捕她时给她戴上手铐。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231117/Most-states-ban-shackling-pregnant-women-in-custody-yet-many-report-being-restrained.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231117/Most-states-ban-shackling-pregnant-women-in-custody-yet-many-report-being-restrained.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4641b652-3d4e-4329-85ba-9449486a0049 Fri, 17 Nov 2023 06:04:22 -0500 Most states ban shackling pregnant women in custody, yet many report being restrained
超越胰岛素：Medi-Cal 扩大患者获得糖尿病用品的机会琼·沃罗斯从沙发上跳了起来，一声高亢的蜂鸣声警告她需要快速补充糖份。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231117/Beyond-insulin-Medi-Cal-expands-病人-access-to-diabetes-supplies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231117/Beyond-insulin-Medi-Cal-expands-病人-access-to-diabetes-supplies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=123dd4b8-080a-4d1d-a817-46f37574e9cd Fri, 17 Nov 2023 06:03:01 -0500 Beyond insulin: Medi-Cal expands patient access to diabetes supplies
人工智能增强的自闭症治疗：多阶段集成学习如何改变游戏规则 作者：Pooja预测和识别影响或有助于自闭症谱系障碍治疗的特征。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231117/AI-enhanced-autism-therapy-How-multi-stage-ensemble-learning-is-changing-the-game-By-Pooja.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231117/AI-enhanced-autism-therapy-How-multi-stage-ensemble-learning-is-changing-the-game-By-Pooja.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c2e1a0f4-9be0-4dcf-8f4a-b6b80d006463 Fri, 17 Nov 2023 05:06:00 -0500 AI-enhanced autism therapy: How multi-stage ensemble learning is changing the game By Pooja
研究警告：集约化养猪与危险的人畜共患病原体有关《美国国家科学院院刊》最近的一项研究表明，大规模养猪规模的扩大导致了新型高致病性猪链球菌菌株的出现，构成了潜在的人畜共患威胁。该研究强调了面对牲畜数量不断增加的监测和控制策略的迫切需要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231116/Intective-pig-farming-linked-to-dangerous-zoonotic-pathogens-study-warns.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231116/Intective-pig-farming-linked-to-dangerous-zoonotic-pathogens-study-warns.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0b08644e-749c-4168-a47c-fd82c70ff1d0 Thu, 16 Nov 2023 23:31:00 -0500 Intensive pig farming linked to dangerous zoonotic pathogens, study warns
新研究提供了英国围手术期心脏骤停的全面情况一项新研究检查了英国 300 多家医院在一年内发生的所有手术期间或手术后不久发生的心脏骤停，发现每 10,000 例需要麻醉的手术中就有 3 例发生这种极其危险且往往致命的事件。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231116/New-study-provides-compressive-picture-of-perioperative-cardiac-arrest-in-the-UK.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231116/New-study-provides-compressive-picture-of-perioperative-cardiac-arrest-in-the-UK.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b6d5abce-3f87-4d94-abff-66d2d0d0cf86 Thu, 16 Nov 2023 22:53:00 -0500 New study provides comprehensive picture of perioperative cardiac arrest in the UK
生酮饮食和糖尿病：是有希望的搭配还是有问题的搭配？ 《糖尿病治疗》中最近发表的一篇研究文章探讨了生酮饮食在治疗 1 型、2 型和妊娠期糖尿病方面的有效性。尽管具有减肥和改善血糖控制等潜在益处，但该研究强调了尚未解决的问题，以及在将生酮饮食纳入糖尿病管理临床指南之前需要进行更广泛的研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231116/Ketogenic-diets-and-diabetes-A-promising-match-or-a-questionable-pair.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231116/Ketogenic-diets-and-diabetes-A-promising-match-or-a-questionable-pair.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9fde4973-a8f9-4d6d-a9bd-d9831bb04429 Thu, 16 Nov 2023 22:52:00 -0500 Ketogenic diets and diabetes: A promising match or a questionable pair?
悉尼科技大学研究人员测试新型手持设备，以快速准确地识别药物样本悉尼科技大学 (UTS) 法证科学中心博士候选人 Harry Fursman 正在两个方面开展工作，以防止吸毒者受到伤害：他正在测试一种新型手持设备，以快速准确地识别毒品样本，并对用过的毒品样本进行持续的化学分析。注射器。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231116/UTS-researcher-tests-new-handheld-device-for-rapidly-and-accurately-identifying-drug-specimens.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231116/UTS-researcher-tests-new-handheld-device-for-rapidly-and-accurately-identifying-drug-specimens.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=020adf60-c589-4144-864a-4c58beed27d2 Thu, 16 Nov 2023 22:35:28 -0500 UTS researcher tests new handheld device for rapidly and accurately identifying drug specimens
